spell_list.description: If Acceleration Strike hits an enemy, and is followed soon thereafter by 3 more combat arts or by letting the 24 seconds expire, the Slayer's attack, casting, and recovery speed increases for a limited duration. Higher ranks increase the duration of the bonuses.

Increases Ability Recovery Speed of caster by 25.0%
Increases Attack Speed of caster by 41.2
